name: Return of the Simurgh
description: Simurghs (Eastern Phoenix) tend to resurrect near the skirts of the tallest mountains of the land when they die. The harsh winds of the land carry ashes of their physical forms away from their homeland, Mount Kafkuh. The players compete as freshly resurrected Simurghs. This is a BFB powered TTRPG game. Players will draw cards and create their own encounter either through imagination or with provided prompts. The players will compete to collect the highest score to reach mount Kafkuh first.
